channel.title: Hey, I'm Jure, I'm building Viaemail.me & I <3 bootstrapping!
channel.description:
Hey all!
My name is Jure and I'm an iOS/Rails developer building [Viaemail.me][1].
Like the title says, I love sustainable businesses/products and I trully believe that you can make a difference with a small product that solves a specific problem. As long as it does that good enough, you can ask for money from your customers and you can grow your business from there. No VC money needed! :smile:
Anyway, I'm building Viaemail and we kinda "pivoted" (although I hate that word) very early on because I had a chance to talk with Jusin J. and he pointed out some really cool stuff which made us focus on a community we're closer to. What do you guys think? Any feedback would be awesome. :smile:
Thanks and I'm really happy to be a part of this amazing community of like-minded people!
[1]: http://www.viaemail.me

item.title: Hey, I'm Jure, I'm building Viaemail.me & I <3 bootstrapping!

item.description:
Hey! Sorry, forgot about that. I’m from Slovenia, Europe.

As long as it does that good enough, you can ask for money from your customers and you can grow your business from there. No VC money needed!
